initial_classification.description: initial classification of radiation plan into anatomical sites
initial_classification.system_prompt: You are a helpful medical assistant with expertise in radiation oncology.
initial_classification.user_prompt: Which of these sites does the following radiation plan address? The treatment sites are: {classes}. The radiation plan is {RADIATION_PLAN}. Answer with only a single site and nothing else.

check.system_prompt: You are a helpful medical assistant with expertise in radiation oncology.
check.user_prompt: Your task is to check the initial classification of the radiation plan into one of these treatment sites: {classes}. The radiation plan is {RADIATION_PLAN}. The initial classification is {INITIAL_CLASSIFICATION_RESULT}. Answer with only a single site and nothing else.
